import React, {useState} from 'react' import Quest from '../../accountmenu/uikit/Quest' import BigButton from '../../accountmenu/uikit/BigButton' import '../css/licensegov.css' const LicenseGov = ({ licIndex }) => { const licenses = [ { title: 'Licencija 1', img: '', desc: `
